column1: quote
Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans for the future.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on, no matter what.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take. Wayne Gretzky said that, and he was absolutely right.
Believe you can and you're halfway there. The other half is putting in the work to make it happen.
Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams and work hard to achieve them.
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions and attitude towards life.
If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else. We rise by lifting others along the way.
It is never too late to be what you might have been. The best time to start is now, so don't wait.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. Choose wisely.
Don't watch the clock do what it does. Keep going and make the most of every moment you have.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value to those around you and to society.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are. That's all anyone can ask of themselves.
I've learned that people will forget what you said, but they'll never forget how you made them feel.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated. Simplify and focus on what matters.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. Start today.
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world for the better.
Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck in disguise.
You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it. Choose your reactions wisely.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world. It starts with your own actions and attitude.
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude about it.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Take that first step towards your dreams.
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant for the future.
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life. Be true to yourself and your values.
We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars. Keep your eyes on your goals.
The pessimist complains about the wind the optimist expects it to change the realist adjusts the sails.
It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up and keep moving forward.
Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible. Then work hard to make it happen.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened. Cherish the memories and look forward.
If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together. Teamwork makes the dream work.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra effort you put in every day.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you as you move forward.
You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today. Focus on what you can control now.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. Keep growing and evolving.
Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday. Keep improving.
Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet. Find joy in the little things and cherish each moment.
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. Just keep going.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail for others.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate.
Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you thought you couldn't.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage. Be brave and watch your world grow.
The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do. Prove the doubters wrong.
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on. Better days are coming.
You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have. So let your imagination run wild.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years. Live fully.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one. You have the power to change.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. Settling for less is not an option.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started. The secret of getting started is breaking your tasks into small steps.
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. Trust yourself.
Every strike brings me closer to the next home run. Failure is just another step towards success.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving forward, no matter what.
The mind is everything. What you think you become. So think big, dream big, and achieve big.
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change. Take control of your destiny.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it. Keep pushing.
It always seems impossible until it's done. So keep working towards your goals, no matter what.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. Action speaks louder than words.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great. Take that first step now.
The expert in anything was once a beginner. Don't be afraid to start something new and learn.
If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door. Create your own opportunities and make things happen.
The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
The future depends on what you do today. Every action you take shapes the path ahead of you.
Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great.
You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. Love what you do.
The best revenge is massive success. Let your achievements speak louder than your words.
Knowing is not enough we must apply. Willing is not enough we must do. Take action today.
Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude. Stay positive and aim high.
Formal education will make you a living self-education will make you a fortune. Never stop learning.
In the symphony of life, you are the composer and conductor. Choose your melodies wisely and play them well.
Don't let yesterday take up too much of today. Focus on the present and shape your future.
Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do. Work hard for your dreams.
To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence. Believe in yourself.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent. Own your power and self-worth.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible. Then work to make it happen.
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot but make it hot by striking. Create your own opportunities.
If you can dream it, you can do it. Your imagination is your preview of life's coming attractions.
The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek , and checks you patience.
The harder you fall, the higher you bounce. Use setbacks as springboards to greater success.
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later. Reap the rewards of hard work.
Whatever you are, be a good one. Strive for excellence in everything you do, no matter how small.
Change your thoughts and you change your world. Your mindset shapes your reality.
The best way to predict the future is to create it. Take control of your destiny and forge ahead.
Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars. Aim high in all you do.
